turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi I would like you to order a pizza from Rossatis pizzaria

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes I can help you with that! Can you give me the address of the pizzaria?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes the address is 4506 N Milwaukee ave.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok . Thank you! Which type of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a large size cheese pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What type of toppings ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like half of the pizza with onions and half wirh green peppers

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. They also would like to know if the souce would be marinare

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is ok. Thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Also they have an offer for 2 more dollars 2 liters of pop

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I would like it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which one? They have coke, diet coke, sprite

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like diet coke

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I am adding to your order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok Iam contacting the store

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to pay by card or by cash at delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: By cash at delivery is fine. Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. So reviewing the order. A large size cheese pizza with half onions and half green peppers dollars. and A 2 liters diet coke for an extra 2

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct. Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Waiting for store reply.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It is ok . Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total of your order is 22.50. Is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. Thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Around what time will the pizza be delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The address for delivery, please

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yes sorry. 5501 W lawrence ave.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you you will receive you pizza in approximately 45 minutes but you can contact the store at any time at 7734567890. Thank you for your order!
